name: Pixel Parkour
description:
A simple parkour platformer that challenges judgement and reflex with deadly spikes, obstacles, projectiles and more through 24 hand crafted levels. 

CONTROLS

Move Left or Right with keys A and D, or arrow keys. Jump with the SPACE bar. Restart level with R, return to menu with T, pause with ESC.

OBJECTIVE & GAMEPLAY

Reach the yellow portal at the end of each level. Avoid traps, enemies and projectiles. A timer and death count is included for competitive players. Levels get progressively harder and introduce a plethora of new enemies and content. The core mechanics remain the same throughout the game.

FEATURES
  • 24 Levels
  • Spikes, Green & Blue Birds, Red & Blue Turrets,  Laser Turrets, Turning Spikes
  • Two Soundtracks & Nature Sounds
  • 8 Hidden Easter Eggs
